pages.text: Invokes the intensity of the monsoon, causing continuous rain that $(warning) cannot be disabled for the duration of the ritual, unless it is ended early with a $(l:apparatus/bucket_of_water)bucket of water$().$(br2) In addition, lightning will strike within the area of the ritual, and all nearby entities will be extinguished of fire.$(br2)$(standing_stones) $(l:rituals/ritual_heavy_storms#multiblock)This ritual requires standing stones.$()
